tool_description: this api allows you to get data(country , timezone ,coordinates , ....etc) of any city in the world, it can also gives you all cities that starts with a specific string you enter , all cities of a specific  country...etc
name: World Citiies api
title: World Citiies api

api_list.name: cities info
api_list.description: Get info of cities that start with a specific string (like "al") , or simply get  info of a specific city that you enter
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://world-citiies-api.p.rapidapi.com/cities/al"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-citiies-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://world-citiies-api.p.rapidapi.com/cities/{city_name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-citiies-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: alternative names of a city (including local names)

api_list.name: country cities
